author: Adilev Meirovici
title: The tantra school
content:
she wants to learn tantra in india, so she looks online to find the right course for her.. 
what she didn't know that these are classic tourist trap and they charge to much money for what she can get for a fraction of the price if she will look for it when she get there... 
why you ask? because, it's in india, if you have a website, it must be expansive

Now she knows, 3500 euros are 13k ILS
